objects.description: [UNC3886](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1048) used `vmtoolsd.exe` to run commands on guest virtual machines from a compromised ESXi host.(Citation: Google Cloud Threat Intelligence ESXi VIBs 2022)(Citation: Google Cloud Threat Intelligence VMWare ESXi Zero-Day 2023)(Citation: Google Cloud Mandiant UNC3886 2024)(Citation: Mandiant Fortinet Zero Day)
